TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectStateManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 维护实体类型实例和关系实例的对象状态和标识管理。

span.span: Maintains object state and identity management for entity type instances and relationship instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪查询结果，并提供逻辑来合并多个重叠的查询结果。 tracks query results, and provides logic to merge multiple overlapping query results. 它还在用户插入、删除或修改对象时执行内存中的更改跟踪，并提供用于更新的更改集。It also performs in-memory change tracking when a user inserts, deletes, or modifies objects, and provides the change set for updates. 此变更集由更改处理器用于保存修改。This change set is used by the change processor to persist modifications. 此类通常由 使用，不直接在应用程序中使用。This class is typically used by and not directly in applications. ## Examples 这些示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。These examples are based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 下面的示例从 获取 ，并使用状态管理器访问上下文中的对象。The following example gets the from the and uses the state manager to access an object in the context. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectStateManager](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectstatemanager)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectStateManager](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectstatemanager)] 下面的示例使用返回的 的 方法，根据对象的实体键获取对象。The following example uses the method on the returned to get an object based on its entity key. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ApplyItemUpdates](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#applyitemupdates)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ApplyItemUpdates](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#applyitemupdates)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的对象的状态更改要删除约束关系中不会导致相关的对象。Calling the method to change the state of an object to does not cause related objects in a constrained relationship to be deleted. 更改对象的状态不影响对象关系图中的相关的对象。Changing the state of an object does not affect related objects in the object graph. 当你更改到的实体对象项，该对象的所有属性都标记为已修改，而不考虑当前或原始值。When you change the of an entity object entry to , all the properties of the object are marked as modified, regardless of the current or original values. 当化实体对象条目更改为， ，或，也将更新对象的关系项。When the of an entity object entry is changed to , , or , the relationship entries for the object are also updated.

span.span: When the object is not detached and does not have an entry in the state manager.

span.span: Changes the state of the specified relationship between two entity objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于基于外键关联的关系，不支持此方法。This method is not supported for relationships based on a foreign key association.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类作为中心编程接口，可用于在运行时和应用程序上下文中与 Entity Data Model (EDM) 元数据交互。The class is a central programming interface that you can use to interact with the Entity Data Model (EDM) metadata at runtime and in the context of an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于获取持久性未知的对象。The method is used to obtain the for objects that are persistence ignorant. 当对象实现或从其继承、从访问属性。When objects implement or inherit from , the is accessed from the property. 时的对象处于不能返回状态。The cannot be returned when the object is in a state. 调用方法是调用相同方法，只不过此方法返回`false`而不是引发异常。Calling the method is the same as calling the method, except that this method returns `false` instead of raising an exception.
